title: For Sale: T206 Lot of Seven
author: Jayworld

posts.post_title: For Sale: T206 Lot of Seven
posts.post_content:
Hi:
Like to sell the following from my collection. Have had all the cards since 1978. Non-smoking environment. Please see scans for more explanation on conditions, etc. I have reduced the prices for all remaining cards by $5.
Cards are:
Lindaman, Boston (National) - Piedmont, Good condition $20
McQuillan, Philadelphia (National) - Tolstoi, Poor Condition $15
Oldring, Philadelphia (American) - Sweet Caporal, Fair Condition $15
Pattee, Brooklyn - Piedmont, Poor Condition (pencil on back, creasing) $20
Sweeney, Boston (National) - Piedmont, Good Condition $15

Wallace and Willis are now sold.

Shipping $3.00 extra (includes insurance). Buy more than one and shipping is still $3.00. 
Please email or PM with any questions or if interested.

Many thanks,
Jay
[url]jayworld@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Donny:
Have already sold the Willis and Wallace card this morning. All others available.

Remaining cards no longer available through the forum and have been posted as a lot on eBay. Thank you all very much for the interest.

Thanks,
Jay
